title: Ep 136: The Leap of Faith and Failure
description: This episode I get super deep on failure and taking the leap into a creative career. A 35 year-old man writes in asking how to cope with a failed wrestling career. A 19 year-old boo boo asks if he should quit his day job to pursue music full time. How do we know when it's time to throw in the towel or take a leap of faith? Also, family issues! Nieces, nephews and how to visit them when their parents are horrible. This episode is so deep you will love it, bros!
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
